channel.title: New [PVP] [Faction/but no protection] [Grief] [Raid] SERVER 108.171.214.152:2556
channel.description:
We at outsetcraft strive to provide the best play experience for our members we have many plugins to give the player a fufilling experience, we allow raid grief pvp and players are ment to survive. we do not give out ranks or items, but you can donate via paypal to recieve ingame ranks. Players on this server earn money by hunting mobs and killing other players, you can also earn money by selling rare items to the shop. once a player has accumulated enough funds he is then able to buy enchants for his armor/tools, we will be adding new buildings in the future such as a new pvp/mob arena and possibly spleef.
108.171.214.152:25565 :) :) :) [img]http://cdn.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1229/2012-07-17_000408_2932074.png[/img] [img]http://cdn.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1229/2012-07-17_000522_2932079.png[/img] [img]http://cdn.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1229/2012-07-17_111040_2936666.png[/img]
